alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, southeastern Alachua, northeastern Marion, western Putnam and southwestern Clay Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Citra to 6 miles west of Salt Springs. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Interlachen, Fort McCoy, Melrose, Citra, Hawthorne, Lake Delancy, George`s Lake, Lake Geneva and Florahome. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
